[Home](./index.md) &gt; [gatsby-plugin-next-seo](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.md) &gt; [GatsbySeo](./gatsby-plugin-next-seo.gatsbyseo.md)

## GatsbySeo variable

This component render the tags in the `<head>` for SEO on a per page basis. As a bare minimum, you should add a title and description.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
GatsbySeo: ({ metaTags, linkTags, canonical, description, facebook, htmlAttributes, language, languageAlternates, mobileAlternate, nofollow, noindex, openGraph, title, titleTemplate, twitter, base, }: GatsbySeoProps) => JSX.Element
```

## Remarks


```tsx
import React from 'react';
import { GatsbySeo } from 'gatsby-plugin-next-seo';

export default () => (
  <>
    <GatsbySeo title='Simple Usage Example' description='A short description goes here.' />
    <p>Simple Usage</p>
  </>
);

```
